properties.areaDesc: Delaware, OK; Cherokee, OK; Mayes, OK; Wagoner, OK
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 10 at 11:41AM CST until January 10 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
At 1141 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm with strong low level rotation
that could produce a tornado at any time was located 6 miles
northwest of Hulbert, moving northeast at 30 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage
to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree damage is
likely.

Locations in or near the path include...
Locust Grove...                   Salina...
Leach...                          Peggs...
Rose...                           Sportsmen Acres Community...
Lost City...                      Murphy...
Snowdale State Park...
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

NWSheadline: A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE...SOUTHEASTERN MAYES...EAST CENTRAL WAGONER AND NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES
